Man charged with fraud to receive more charges soon

Gary H PERIOD McCaffrey who is being held in Centre County Prison on  charges of theft by deception and failure to make proper disposition of funds will be arraigned before Judge David Grine March  a criminal court spokeswoman said PERIOD

Additional charges against McCaffrey  W PERIOD Suburban Ave. are expected to be filed by Feb PERIOD  District Justice Clifford Yorks said PERIOD

Yorks said he reduced McCaffreys bail from  to  at the request of the district attorneys office and the police handling the case so they could obtain McCaffreys cooperation on matters involving insurance policies PERIOD

As of yesterday afternoon the accused had not applied for bail PERIOD

McCaffrey was accused of failing to invest sums ranging from  to  he received from  alleged fraud victims including University employees and police from State College Ferguson Township and the Pennsylvania State Police in State College PERIOD

The total amount involved exceeded  PERIOD He had told the alleged victims that he was investing the money in videocassette recorders and stocks on the London Stock Exchange PERIOD Charges were filed on four separate dates in January and February PERIOD

McCaffrey told police that he gave money for the videocassette recorders to an unknown man at Penn National Race Course near Harrisburg received no receipt and did not see the machines according to police reports filed with the district justices office PERIOD

McCaffrey told police that he used money received from several of the complaintants to pay debts over a period of two months immediately before his arrest police reports said PERIOD

Charges of writing checks on insufficient funds and theft of leased property that were also filed against McCaffrey will not be brought up at the arraignment Yorks said PERIOD

A joint investigation by University Police Services the State College Bureau of Police Services and the State College division of the Pennsylvania State Police is continuing PERIOD

by James A PERIOD Stewart
